comment: DO NOT TAKE! Interesting guy with a lot of knowledge regarding the subject, but almost too much. I was putting in just as much time for this "2 hour" class as some of my junior and senior level CE courses!  So unless the mechanics of flight gives you a woody, avoid this class.
There is a lot of work for a 2 credit class but he is very flexible if you ask.  Just do the reading and participate, you will do fine.

DO NOT take this class. Way too much work for a 2 credit hour class. You will have to read the most boring book ever written about the wright brothers and that about all the "history of flight" you'll get. They should change the name of this course to the origins of flight because we never really got past the wrights. Take a different STS class

Really cool guy - but for a 2000 level 2 hour class it is a lot of work. Expect weekly reading quizzes, 3 papers, 1 major research paper, a debate, and two tests. He does return quizzes and tests, and lets you edit papers after he goes through them for regrading. Overall however don't expect to know your grade until you see it on your transcript.

Difficult for a 2000 level course. Sometimes likes to make it feel like his class is the most important class you will ever take based on assignment difficulty. Hated that I asked him on four occasions for my grades on papers that I had submitted, and I never received them at all. Lacks a sense of urgency when it comes to grades. Good luck.

This class is a lot of work for two hours. The good news is if you work hard in the beginning the end will be easy. Three easy style papers, one major research paper, ten quizzes, three major tests and the final.  Quizzes would have been hard but he gives you the questions before the test. All the tests are the same test. You will learn something.
Extremely intelligent guy and cool to talk to. The class does move very very fast and like others have mentioned, there is a lot of writing assignments. I'm glad I took the class though.

You cannot walk with him, you must run!!Very knowledgeable amd helpful, but the works are very excessive compare to other classes for 2 credit hours, a quiz for every class, 2 tests, 1 final, 4-5 easys, 1term paper(10pg+), and face to face debate(with debate report). You might get lucky if he cancels one day of his class, the debate will be dropped

He is Probably the best teacher I have taken.  He knows just about everything.  His main objective is for the student to grasp the material and therefore will be lenient to grading (extra credits).  The way he breaks down the subject for students to learn is good as well.I highly recommend this teacher. 90 percent of my class (hist. flight)got an A
Very unclear about assignments, and does not return tests. He does not tell students what grade they have.
Very good teacher, is an consultant and knows his material very well.  Helpful if you don't understand some items in lectures.
Very knowlegeable of the subject(computers).  Test are fair, assignments are okay.  Just do the work he assigns and your will be fine.
